actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-266.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3403) to amend the Hazardous Materials Transportation Act to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1982, and 1983, to provide for the establishment of regional training centers to assist in improving the emergency response and enforcement capabilities of State and local personnel, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3403 (Emergency response centers funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3403) to amend the Hazardous Materials Transportation Act to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1982, and 1983, to provide for the establishment of regional training centers to assist in improving the emergency response and enforcement capabilities of State and local personnel, and for other purposes.
